page.title: 02TRANSPORT IN GRANGE/BUTETOWN
page.content:
{Roads The A4160 Penarth Road is the main road and runs in a N.E. direction through the area (174/750 to 184/758). Leckwith Road A4055 passes in a N.E. direction through (160-170). These roads are the busiest in the area. Both Clare Road/Corporation Road and Sloper Road are busy main roads.
The{Bus Depot169/755}off Sloper Road, belongs to Cardiff City Corporation.It is a large hangar like building used for housing single and double decked buses. The{Central Bus Station 182/760}was remodernised in 1983 and caters for the local buses and National Coaches.It consists of a one way system of bus lanes, off which are tinted glass shelters.
